title: Reflections
description: 'Reflections' is a collection of thoughts and poems of the author on a variety of topics ... Education, People, Life, Love, Pain & Suffering, Death, I, Ego and Search for the meaning of one's existence. The tone and the language change their shades from simple perceptions … advising … to intellectual & philosophical insights. The contexts vary from personal, societal to spiritual ... leading to a sensitive exploration into the purpose of one's life.
author: Manoj Kulshreshtha
